commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Ahh, the table feels so nice and cold.

commands.select_args: ||I bought some orange juice for you.|| select_1

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Here, I bought some orange juice for you.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Thank you. I'm so thirsty, so this'll really hit the spot.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Here's a cold hand towel for you.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Mm, it's scented... How calming.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: You really sang your lungs out today.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Chuckle* Everyone was cheering me on with so much might, so I put in all of my energy to respond to them.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah, it was incredible. The stage and audience became one. It was an awesome live show filled with excitement.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Ahh, I'm so happy everyone accepts me and my selfish ways, and even cheers for me. It really is wonderful being a school idol.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Did you get some vigor from everyone?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Of course! So much that I'm overflowing with it. I feel like I can put in even more effort starting tomorrow.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm sure everyone who came to see you feels the same way. With all the vigor you gave them, I bet they're ready to take tomorrow head-on.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I sure hope so. But I'm exhausted from all of the energy I spent today. My mind is still full of enthusiasm, but my body just won't listen. *Flop*

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Get some good rest today.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Ahhh, I'm exhausted, but I feel amazing. I bet I'm the happiest person in the world right now.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I'm also happy I got to witness your live show. Thanks for the wonderful time.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I should be thanking you for bearing with my selfish ways.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I do this because I enjoy it, so no need for thanks.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: That just won't do. You know what they say? Good manners even between friends, right? So, thank you.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Not at all. You're very welcome.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh, I just got a text from Haruka.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: She was at the show, wasn't she? What did she say?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: "The live show was so much fun! My throat's hoarse now from all of my excitement. You really are super amazing and cool!"

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's good to hear.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Yup! I'm glad I gave it my all! It really was so incredibly good!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* I think that's the best cheer you've got today.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Oh, here's the rest of it... Um... "You should live more for yourself, just like you did today. It would make me happier to see you that way, too."

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Aww, Haruka's growing up! She's gonna make me cry!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's okay for you to cry, there's only the two of us here.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: *Wail* I'm so happy. I'm gonna save this message forever and never delete it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It looks like you two have gone back to being tight sisters again. Actually, maybe you're closer now more than ever.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I think so. We're able to tell each other how we truly feel now. She even asked me to make her boxed lunches again.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Hm? It looks like I've got a message from Haruka as well. Let's see...

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: "I got to see my sister at her absolute coolest. Thank you so much."

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: "Even Kanata said that she couldn't have done it without your support. Please keep your door open again for the next time I seek your advice."

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: What?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Huh? What's wrong, Kanata?

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Hmm, hummmph... I want Haruka's wishes to be granted, but this won't do!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Your support is vital to me! So, could you please keep supporting me forever and ever?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: *Laugh* Don't worry, I'll always support you. It's my job to grant all of your selfish desires, after all.
